meanings.definition: A person who believes in the theory that all matter is composed of tiny indivisible particles called atoms.
meanings.sent1: The atomist studied the smallest building blocks of everything.
meanings.sent2: She became an atomist after learning about atomic theory in school.
meanings.sent3: The atomist joked that even a crumbled cookie was made of atoms.
meanings.sent4: In the world of ideas, he was an atomist, breaking down complex thoughts into simple elements.
meanings.sent5: The curious child asked the atomist how many atoms were in a raindrop.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the theory that all matter is composed of tiny indivisible particles called atoms.
meanings.sent1: The atomist perspective views the universe as a collection of tiny particles.
meanings.sent2: Scientists conducted experiments to support the atomist hypothesis.
meanings.sent3: The atomist paint color was a blend of all primary colors.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked in an atomist way, breaking down complex problems into simpler components.
meanings.sent5: The atomist concept of matter revolutionized scientific thought.
